class.description: A class that passes the gst_pipes node interfaces to a gst_bridge element.
Play and pause a GStreamer pipeline with a Gazebo style service call
A class that can cause a gst element to drop buffers within the pipeline. This can be used to pull single frames from a video stream.
Publishes the presentation timestamp (PTS) of gstreamer buffers to topic `/{mysrc}/gst_pts`. This can be used with `ros2 topic hz` to measure the frame rate of video
